text: Pietro Bottaccioli (February 15, 1928 - January 22, 2017) was a Roman Catholic bishop. Ordained to the priesthood in 1950, Bottaccioli served as bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Gubbio, Italy, from 1989 to 2004. ==Notes== Category:1928 births Category:2017 deaths Category:People from Umbertide Category:Italian Roman Catholic bishops Category:20th-century Roman Catholic bishops Category:21st-century Roman Catholic bishops
title: Pietro Bottaccioli
